org.jgrapes.portal.base.events

Class PageResourceRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgrapes.core.internal.EventBase<T>
      • org.jgrapes.core.Event<ResourceResult>
        • org.jgrapes.portal.base.events.ResourceRequest
          • org.jgrapes.portal.base.events.PageResourceRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Future<ResourceResult>, org.jgrapes.core.Associator, org.jgrapes.core.Eligible

    public class PageResourceRequest
extends ResourceRequest

    An event that signals the request of a resource that is to be added to the <HEAD> section of the page.

    Requests for such resources are usually generated during portal boot. See the description of AddPageResources for details.
